Package game_code

Class Island

java.lang.Object
game_code.Island
public class Island
extends java.lang.Object
The Island class, representing the islands the player can sail to.
Author:
Klai

    • Island

      public Island​(java.lang.String name, java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemsSold, java.util.ArrayList<Good> itemsBought)
      The constructor of the Island class. Has default values.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the island
      itemsSold - The items being sold on the island
      itemsBought - The items the island is willing to buy

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the island.
      Returns:
      the name of the island, in String form.

    • getItemsSold

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemsSold()
      Gets the items available on the island
      Returns:
      the items being sold, in ArrayList form.

    • getItemsBought

      public java.util.ArrayList<Good> getItemsBought()
      Gets the items the island wants to buy.
      Returns:
      the bought items, in ArrayList form.

    • buyItem

      public void buyItem​(Ship ship, Item product, GameStats game, int quantity)
      * Buying an item from the island Adds an item to Cargo if conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      ship - The player's ship
      product - The Good instance being purchased
      game - The current stats of the game(used to get money)
      quantity - The quantity of the item being purchased

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem​(Ship ship, Good product, GameStats game, int quantity)
      * Selling goods to the island sells the good in cargo, increasing Capacity and money, then records the sale.
      Parameters:
      ship - The player's ship
      product - The Good instance being purchased
      game - The current stats of the game(used to get money)
      quantity - The quantity of the item being purchased

    • validPurchase

      public boolean validPurchase​(Ship buyer, GameStats game, Item product, int quantity)
      Checks if the purchase is valid
      Parameters:
      buyer - The buyer of the item(player)
      game - The GameStats class, used to get the amount of money the player has
      product - The Item being purchased
      quantity - The number of Good being purchased
      Returns:
      if the purchase is valid, in boolean form
